Package org.opengrok.indexer.search.context

Class HistoryContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.search.context.HistoryContext
  • public class HistoryContext
extends Object
    it is supposed to get the matching lines from history log files. since Lucene does not easily give the match context.

      • getContext

        public boolean getContext​(File src,
                          String path,
                          Writer out,
                          String context)
                   throws HistoryException
        Obtain the history for the source file src and write out matching History log entries.
        Parameters:
        src - the source file represented by path (SOURCE_ROOT + path)
        path - the path of the file (rooted at SOURCE_ROOT)
        out - write destination
        context - the servlet context path of the application (the path prefix for URLs)
        Returns:
        true if at least one line has been written out.
        Throws:
        HistoryException - history exception

      • writeMatch

        protected static void writeMatch​(Appendable out,
                                 String line,
                                 int start,
                                 int end,
                                 boolean flatten,
                                 String path,
                                 String wcontext,
                                 String nrev,
                                 String rev)
                          throws IOException
        Write a match to a stream.
        Parameters:
        out - the receiving stream
        line - the matching line
        start - start position of the match
        end - position of the first char after the match
        flatten - should multi-line log entries be flattened to a single
        path - path to the file
        wcontext - web context (begin of URL)
        nrev - old revision
        rev - current revision line? If true, replace newline with space.
        Throws:
        IOException - IO exception
